issues.fullMessage: In the interests of keeping code clean, the simplest possible conditional syntax should be used. That means using the "??" operator for an assign-if-not-null operator, and using the ternary operator "?:" for assignment to a single variable.

properties.title: The simplest possible condition syntax should be used
